Red.short_summary: Direct, results-oriented, and competitive. Red personalities are driven to achieve and take charge of situations.
strengths: Gets things done quickly and efficiently
Comfortable making tough decisions under pressure
Drives projects forward and overcomes obstacles
Sets ambitious goals and pursues them relentlessly
Not afraid to challenge the status quo
watch_outs: May come across as impatient or overly blunt
Can overlook others' feelings in pursuit of results
May dominate conversations or decisions
Risk of burnout from constant drive for achievement
May struggle to delegate or trust others with tasks
communication_tips: Be direct and get to the point quickly
Focus on results, outcomes, and bottom-line impact
Present options and let them make decisions
Avoid excessive small talk or lengthy explanations
Respect their time and come prepared
Red.disclaimer_line: This description is for educational purposes only and reflects general tendencies, not fixed personality traits.

Yellow.short_summary: Enthusiastic, social, and optimistic. Yellow personalities thrive on interaction and are naturally persuasive.
strengths: Builds rapport and relationships easily
Creates positive and energetic team environments
Skilled at motivating and inspiring others
Adaptable and open to new ideas
Natural ability to network and connect people
watch_outs: May overcommit or struggle with follow-through
Can be disorganized or overlook details
May avoid difficult conversations to maintain harmony
Risk of talking more than listening
Can be impulsive in decision making
communication_tips: Be friendly and allow time for social connection
Show enthusiasm and energy in interactions
Use stories and examples to illustrate points
Provide recognition and positive feedback
Keep the atmosphere light and collaborative
Yellow.disclaimer_line: This description is for educational purposes only and reflects general tendencies, not fixed personality traits.

Green.short_summary: Supportive, patient, and reliable. Green personalities value stability and are skilled at creating harmony.
strengths: Creates stable and supportive environments
Excellent at listening and understanding others
Reliable and follows through on commitments
Skilled at mediating conflicts and finding consensus
Provides steady, consistent performance over time
watch_outs: May resist change or avoid taking initiative
Can be overly accommodating at personal expense
May struggle to voice concerns or set boundaries
Risk of being taken advantage of due to helpfulness
Can be slow to make decisions when pressed
communication_tips: Be sincere and take time to build trust
Avoid rushing or pressuring for quick decisions
Acknowledge their contributions and reliability
Provide clear expectations and time to process
Create a safe space for them to share concerns
Green.disclaimer_line: This description is for educational purposes only and reflects general tendencies, not fixed personality traits.

Blue.short_summary: Analytical, precise, and systematic. Blue personalities prioritize accuracy and quality in their work.
strengths: Produces high-quality, accurate work
Thinks through problems systematically
Identifies potential issues before they become problems
Maintains high standards and consistency
Skilled at research, analysis, and documentation
watch_outs: May become paralyzed by analysis or perfectionism
Can be overly critical of self and others
May struggle with ambiguity or quick changes
Risk of appearing cold or detached
Can miss the big picture while focusing on details
communication_tips: Provide data, facts, and logical reasoning
Be prepared to answer detailed questions
Give them time to process and analyze information
Avoid vague statements or unsupported claims
Respect their need for accuracy and thoroughness
Blue.disclaimer_line: This description is for educational purposes only and reflects general tendencies, not fixed personality traits.

blended_result_template.intro: Your results show a blend of {colors}, indicating you draw on multiple behavioral styles depending on the situation.
blended_result_template.note: People with blended profiles often adapt their approach based on context, drawing on different strengths as needed.

general_disclaimer: This assessment is provided for educational and self-awareness purposes only. DISC profiles describe behavioral tendencies and preferences, not fixed personality traits or abilities. Results should not be used for hiring decisions, clinical diagnosis, or any high-stakes evaluation. If the results do not seem accurate to you, trust your own self-knowledge.
